column4: chlorate -- I can try to help you get going by checking some basic things
so you see the sound modules loaded?
chlorate, you should see you sound card in the list, you need to write down the info for it
I think it detected it Audio device: ATI Technologies Inc SBx00 Azalia
oops spelled it wrong. hahaha. It's there and installed
I have to go! Sorry, thank you for all your help.
